fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Lull someone to sleep at night, or serenade the town at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players will know they were lulled to sleep.
- When you lull someone to sleep, remove all their notifications.
- When you serenade the town, you will stop the following day phase from happening.
- You may only serenade the town once.
- You may not lull the same person two nights in a row.
